title: النصب يطيح بـ “كولونيل” مزور
summary: أسقط صيد ثمين، مساء أول أمس (الأربعاء)، بعد تنسيق بين عناصر الأمن الإقليمي بسلا والأمن الجهوي بورزازات، بناء على معلومات وفرتها المديرية العامة لمراقبة التراب الوطني “ديستي” منتحل صفة عقيد “كولونيل”، نصب على ضحايا بالرباط وسلا ومناطق بالصحراء الشرقية. وذكر مصدر “الصباح” أن الموقوف الذي كان يترددأكم…
body: أسقط صيد ثمين، مساء أول أمس (الأربعاء)، بعد تنسيق بين عناصر الأمن الإقليمي بسلا والأمن الجهوي بورزازات، بناء على معلومات وفرتها المديرية العامة لمراقبة التراب الوطني “ديستي” منتحل صفة عقيد “كولونيل”، نصب على ضحايا بالرباط وسلا ومناطق بالصحراء الشرقية. وذكر مصدر “الصباح” أن الموقوف الذي كان يتردد أكمل القراءة » المقالة النصب يطيح بـ “كولونيل” مزور fمنشورة على جريدة الصباح .

title: Chinese submersible explores previously unknown giant craters at the bottom of the Pacific — and they're teeming with life
summary: Scientists have discovered and explored a giant hydrothermal system at the bottom of the Pacific, which could provide a window into the origins of life on Earth.

title: Skull of bear held captive to fight Roman gladiators discovered near ancient amphitheater in Serbia
summary: Archaeologists determined that the bear had an infected injury and had been held captive for a significant amount of time.

title: Key Atlantic current could start collapsing as early as 2055, new study finds
summary: The Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation brings heat to the Northern Hemisphere and regulates the climate globally, but research suggests it could weaken significantly in the coming decades.

title: 40-year-old 'queen of icebergs' A23a is no longer world's biggest after losing several 'very large chunks' since May
summary: A giant iceberg called A23a that broke off Antarctica in 1986 is now disintegrating near South Georgia Island in the South Atlantic Ocean, scientists say.

title: It’s Possible to Remove the Forever Chemicals in Drinking Water. Will It Happen?
summary: New research shows that filtration systems that remove PFAS can also get rid of other harmful substances. Whether they’ll actually be introduced is a different matter entirely.

title: Iconic winged lion statue in Venice may actually be from China's Tang dynasty, study finds
summary: A new study of the trace amounts of lead in Venice's famous winged lion statue suggests that its metal originated in China — and Marco Polo's family may have brought it over.

title: James Webb telescope discovers 'exceptionally rare' 5-galaxy crash in the early universe
summary: Near-infrared images from the James Webb Space Telescope revealed five early universe galaxies merging within a large halo.

title: Who will see the 'blood moon' total lunar eclipse this weekend?
summary: The full moon on Sept. 7, 2025 will be a "blood moon" total lunar eclipse. Here's who will see the longest total lunar eclipse since 2022.

title: 1.8 million-year-old human jawbone discovered in Republic of Georgia — and it may be earliest evidence yet of Homo erectus
summary: A new fossil find in the Republic of Georgia is expanding our understanding of the earliest humans to leave Africa.

title: Hungry Worms Could Help Solve Plastic Pollution
summary: Researchers are working on manipulating the digestive systems of wax worms to create a scalable way of disposing of plastic.

title: Are there any countries with no mosquitoes?
summary: One country's unique climate keeps it a mosquito-free zone, but global warming may change that.

title: 'Strange' tomb in Peru holds skeletons of people with ropes around their necks, hands tied behind their backs, archaeologists say
summary: Human sacrifices dating back around 2,300 years have been found near an ancient temple in Peru.

title: The full 'Corn Moon' rises this week — bringing a 'blood moon' lunar eclipse to most of the world
summary: The Northern Hemisphere's final full moon will be totally eclipsed in some parts of the world. Here's how to see September's full Corn Moon rise.

title: Which animal has the best hearing?
summary: Ranking who has the best ears in the animal kingdom is a tough task, but some animals push the limits of hearing far beyond what humans can imagine.

title: 5 common mistakes beginner astrophotographers make — and how to avoid them
summary: Avoid blurry stars and excessive noise — master these 5 common astrophotography mistakes to capture sharp, stunning night sky images every time.

title: NASA telescope spotted rare interstellar comet 2 months before it was officially 'discovered'
summary: NASA's planet-hunting TESS telescope observed the rare interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS two months before it was formally "discovered," and those early observations reveal the comet is surprisingly active.

title: بالفيديو.. أنغام تفاجئ جمهور مهرجان العلمين
summary: فاجأت النجمة المصرية أنغام الجمهور بحضورها حفل فرقة "كايروكي" في مهرجان العلمين، في أول ظهور علني في حفل غنائي بعد رحلة علاج بالخارج.

title: What's the difference between a turtle and a tortoise?
summary: Turtles and tortoises are both reptiles with shells, so what exactly are their differences?

title: Cataclysmic crash with neighboring planet may be the reason there's life on Earth today, new studies hint
summary: Early Earth may not have had the right ingredients for life — until a nearby Mars-size planet crashed into it, two new studies hint.

title: 2,200-year-old 'complex and delicate' Celtic warrior charm is evidence of sophisticated metalworking in the Iron Age
summary: Archaeologists discovered a 2,200-year-old bronze warrior charm while excavating an ancient Celtic town in Germany.

title: Scientists watch a single electron move during a chemical reaction for first time ever
summary: For the first time, scientists visualized how electrons behave during a chemical reaction, which could help reduce unwanted byproducts in future chemistry.

title: عشرات المفقودين بعد غرق قارب في نيجيريا
summary: أعلنت وكالة الطوارئ النيجيرية، الأحد، أن عناصر الإنقاذ يبحثون عن أكثر من 40 شخصا بعد حادث غرق قارب في ولاية سوكوتو في شمال غرب البلاد.
